arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – The Parisians’ record start to the match!
arts.sum: This Saturday evening, Paris Saint-Germain faces Toulouse at the Stade de Toulouse in Matchday 3 of Ligue 1. With the score tied 4-1 at halftime, Paris has already broken a record in its history. Indeed, the Parisians have scored three goals in less than 15 minutes for the first time in their history. It’s a […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Possible Parisian lineup and suspension risks
arts.sum: This Saturday, third-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face second-placed Toulouse at the Stade de France in Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 (kick-off at 9:05 p.m., CET). arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Relive the Parisians’ training
arts.sum: This Saturday, Paris Saint-Germain will be at the Stadium to face Toulouse (kick-off at 9:05 p.m., CET) as part of the 3rd day of Ligue 1 2025-2026. While waiting for this match, the club allows you to relive the best moments of training during the week in order to prepare for this meeting. ﻿

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – The Parisian squad:1 player missing, 1 comeback
arts.sum: This Saturday (kick-off at 9:05 PM, CZET), third-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face second-placed Toulouse at the Stade de France on Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Here is the squad selected by Parisian coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hakimi, Hernandez, Kamara, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho. Midfielders – Lee, […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse/PSG – Champions League, truce and TFC, Luis Enrique has strong words
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, coach of Paris Saint-Germain (3rd), spoke at a press conference this Friday ahead of facing Toulouse (2nd) at the Stadium tomorrow (kick-off at 9:05 pm, broadcast on Ligue1+) as part of Matchday 3 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. On this occasion, the Spaniard also gave an interview to PSG TV. He discussed the Champions […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – The TFC squad: 5 players out
arts.sum: This Saturday, Paris Saint-Germain (3rd) and Toulouse (2nd) will face off at the Stadium in Matchday 3 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 9:05 p.m., CET). Here is the squad called up by Toulouse coach Carles Martinez Novell for this match. Absent: Azizi, Francis, Messali, Schmidt (injury), Canvot (departure).
